Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2018 11:21AM Diana0418 wrote: it’s been almost a year since I finished up all my treatments & the top & crown of my head is extremely thin and baby fine. You can clearly see my scalp. The sides & back are growing, but I keep itshort so I don’t look too weird. I’m so not happy. 4 rounds taxotere & a full yr of herceptin.
Posts.Title: Taxotere and permanent hair loss Debsmisto Hattiegirl
